Key: (I still have some time. Who should I go on a date with?)
(You know... I keep seeing Rinne's face in my head lately.)
(Why am I so worried about her?)
(Alright, I think I should just visit her.)

(Hm? I pressed the intercom button, but...
I'm really nervous. I can't find the will to go in...)

(You're just visiting your childhood friend, Shido.
Why are you so nervous?! This shouldn't be so hard...)

(Ah, come on. There's no point in overthinking it.
If I'm so worried about Rinne, I should just go talk to her!)
Press the intercom
Don't press the intercom
Is anyone home?
Excuse me! It's your neighbor, Itsuka!
Maybe I'll just take a look inside...
(We're like family. I don't need to be so reserved, right?)
Excuse me!
Heeey! Riiinne? Anybody home?
What?! What... is this?

I-It's not like... she moved, right?
There's no way she could've... not so
quickly. She never mentioned moving either, so...
Huh? Wait a second...

T-This room... it's similar, isn't it?
To my house?! No, there's no mistake.
It looks just like it...

Wait... I came over to play all the time as a kid,
right? Why can't I remember any of that?
How long... has she been living here?
Ngh! What the...? My head... hurts...
Your future is not here...

Huh? Who... who are you?
U-Ugh, my... conscious...ness...
Ah...
(I thought I would, but I think I won't after all.)

(In the past, barging in like this wouldn't
have been an issue, but now... I'm not so sure.)
Shido? What are you doing here?
Hyeek! R-Rinne?! How long have you been there?
Um? I just got home. I was buying things for dinner.
Oh. I see.
Did you need something?
N-No, I just... wanted to talk to you...

You did? Is it really okay for you to be spending
time with me like this?
Of course it is. Why wouldn't it be?
I don't know... Well, what did you want to talk about?

Well... um... sorry. I guess I didn't have
anything specific in mind.
Goodness, Shido. You're always like this.

I'm sorry for bothering you. Okay, well I don't
want to keep you. I'll head home now.
(What am I even doing?)
Okay, see you later, Shido. I'll come by to make dinner.
Alright, we'll be waiting.
See you then.
